definition: Belgium/Belgian/abbr. for 比利時|比利时[Bi3 li4 shi2]
to compare/(followed by a noun and adjective) more {adj.} than {noun}/ratio/to gesture/(Taiwan pr. [bi4] in some compounds derived from Classical Chinese)
Biru county, Tibetan: 'Bri ru rdzong, in Nagchu prefecture 那曲地區|那曲地区[Na4 qu3 di4 qu1], central Tibet

sentences.english: Should we dispatch cadres to help exercise regional national autonomy?
sentences.chinese: 又比如實行民族區域自治，我們派不派幹部？

sentences.english: With no wind indoors, for example, sweat will not evaporate as effectively.
sentences.chinese: 比如說室內無風，就不能有效蒸發汗水。

sentences.english: You swipe up and down to scroll lists of, say, tracks or artists.
sentences.chinese: 你可以上下滑動來滾動列表，比如，藝術家列表。

sentences.english: They might be,for example,in an accident, and come close to being killed,but walk away without a scratch.
sentences.chinese: 比如說在事故中倖存，差點送命，但結果毫髮無傷。

sentences.english: Such sigh absolutly come from no excuse. such as suddenly thought of life and death.
sentences.chinese: 若干感慨，簡直無來由，比如忽然想到生死。

sentences.english: Like a little hamster, who once spend his days in a RV pank.
sentences.chinese: 比如一隻小倉鼠，每天都只能在一個旅行車場度日。

sentences.english: They're perfect for closing open plastic bags, such as rice bags.
sentences.chinese: 它們也是修復塑料袋開口的完美選擇，比如米袋。

sentences.english: An alliance with likeminded Red Talons may not be long in coming.
sentences.chinese: 有差不多意圖的聯盟部族比如紅爪不久也會這麼想。

sentences.english: Panic disorder, for example, gives way to sudden attacks of terror.
sentences.chinese: 比如，恐慌症，總是出現突然的恐慌。

sentences.english: Drink fewer sodas and other sweetened drinks, like iced tea.
sentences.chinese: 少喝蘇打汽水和其他甜飲料，比如冰茶。

sentences.english: For example, Yelp reviews are too long - especially in "the day and age of Twitter," they write on their blog.
For example, the statement “Men are taller than women” is an empirical generalization.
sentences.chinese: 比如“男人比女人高”這句話是一個經驗總結。

sentences.english: Carl Rogers People like Rollo May. People like Carl Rogers.
Such as Chen Xinzhong organization are "non-cotton products" of the new school.
sentences.chinese: 比如陳新忠所在公司就屬於“非棉製品”的新一派。
比如說，“我們一起去圖書館吧。

sentences.english: Dismiss, for example, “some niggles, some feelings of fatigue, ” he said.
sentences.chinese: 他說，比如去除“一些吹毛求疵，一些疲勞感”。

definition: et cetera/and so on .../wait a minute!/hold on!
some/a few/a little/(following an adjective) slightly ...er
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
only natural/as it should be/certainly/of course/without doubt
